name: $code
desc: Returns: Identity (code or path) or the element/item being mapped.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Identity (code or path) or the element/item being mapped.

name: $display
desc: Returns: The display for the code. The display is only provided to help editors when editing the concept map.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The display for the code. The display is only provided to help editors when editing the concept map.

name: $noMap
desc: Returns: If noMap = true this indicates that no mapping to a target concept exists for this source concept.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: If noMap = true this indicates that no mapping to a target concept exists for this source concept.

name: $target
desc: Returns: A concept from the target value set that this concept maps to.

name: $addtarget
desc: A concept from the target value set that this concept maps to.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A concept from the target value set that this concept maps to.
